folder: Tompkins Avenue & St. Marys Avenue, Staten Island, NY
original_title: Richmond: Tompkins Avenue - St. Marys Avenue
text:
Tompkins Avenue, at the N.E. corner of St. Marys Avenue, showing St. Josephs Roman Catholic Church.

1924

P. L. Sperr

folder: Tompkins Avenue & St. Marys Avenue, Staten Island, NY
original_title: Richmond: Tompkins Avenue - St. Marys Avenue
text:
(1)
Tompkins Avenue, at and adjoing the N.E. corner of St. Marys Avenue, showing St. Josephs Roman Catholic Church, as seen from Shaughnessy Lane.
January 18, 1931.

P. L. Sperr

(2)
Another view of the church, viewed from the opposite direction, north along Tompkins Avenue, from near Virginia Avenue.
January 18, 1931

P. L. Sperr

folder: St. Marys Avenue & Tompkins Avenue, Staten Island, NY
original_title: Richmond: St. Marys Avenue - Tompkins Avenue
text:
160 to 168 (left to right) St Mary's Avenue, at, adjoining and west of the S.W. corner of Tompkins Avenue, seen across an empty lot from Shaughnessy Lane.

P. L. Sperr
July 12, 1934
